channel.title: 2006 - revolution Source release [shard]
channel.description:
So this is an old source that I found on my old laptop and I've been working, decided to release it and here I am.
[font=arial black]What I fixed:[/font] [*]Following [*]Player attack [*]Auto restart (set to 100000 hours XD) [*]Npc-Clipping
[font=arial black]What needs to be fixed:[/font] [*]Firemaking should be cliped [*]Castlewars barriers become invisible after destroyed and still block the player [*]Poison Npcs [*]A better door system
[size=36pt]Mini-games:[/size]
[*]CastleWars [*]Pestcontrol [*]FightPits [*]Duel
[size=36pt]Screenshot:[/size]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/pickpocket.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/karama.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/taverly.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/tutisland.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/tutisland.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1224.photobucket.com/albums/ee376/heatrn11/Untitled.jpg[/img]
No flame intended.
[Url=http://www.mediafire.com/?g5w7zytsi5iz19n]Click for Source[/url]

item.title: 2006 - revolution Source release [shard]
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:7, topic:438289”][quote]What I fixed:
Auto restart (set to 100000 hours XD)[/quote]
if you think this is important enough to put as ‘what you have done’
and not even fixed/deleted but just changed the value

the famous ‘it’s an old source i found on my computer tactic’

Then I doubt that you did anything worthy to this.
You prob barely get through an npc-spawning tutorial

and then theres this,

blablablablablablabla
i suck and i am the biggest flamer
on whole mopar,
also,
i suck wieners.

and also, i like to smell dog’s asses, because im a dog myself.[/quote]

item.title: 2006 - revolution Source release [shard]
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

artego:

Is this actually full follow or just the weird following of the originial creativescape release (you can only follow 1 time, noclip the whole time etc)

No it’s not the creativescape follow, well I built off of it and fixed the one click follow, but I’m not very good at clipmaping, so you can still no-clip.

Read full topic
